Description:
A Great Aspect!
Are you ready to build? Do you want to be in a great area? Are you looking for a flat block? If you answered YES to these questions, then look no further! Located in the ever-popular Aspect Estate you will find that this is one of the last vacant allotments available. Boasting 464sqm with a 14.5 metre frontage, this block is ready to be built on. There are no easements on the property, so you can buy with confidence. With ease of access to the freeway and close to shops, public transport and the many schools that Officer has to offer, the decision to purchase this block will be an easy one.

Description:
Your Chance to Live the Dream
Set on approximately 13 acres of undulating land with 4 separate paddocks, 3 of which are electrified, wash bay, chook pen, 2 dams, huge shed with 2 stables already built into it, views out the back that seem to go on forever and, to top it off, backs on to the GWS Anderson Scout Park.
Located just a few minutes drive to Haileybury College (Berwick Campus) plus several other high schools and primary schoosl all within a short drive away, Berwick CBD, the Princes Freeway on ramp (City bound), it's all close by, yet when you are on the property it feels like you are miles from anywhere and all you can hear are the birds and the wind rustling through the trees.
The home itself features four to five good size bedrooms depending on your needs, two bedrooms have their own ensuite, solid wood heater and hardwood floors in the lounge room, gas ducted heating throughout the home and an oversized double garage with internal access which all make for comfortable living.
Just to add to the appeal, there is a large inground pool to enjoy over those Summer months and, more importantly, a large covered pergola at the rear of the residence that is used all year round just to take in that unforgettable vista. This is one well thought out home.
Don't let this unique opportunity pass you by, call us now to arrange an inspection.
Insights: 94 Armytage Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 9 other 5 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Bevington on the Park
Location springs to mind as soon as this property is mentioned. Ideally located literally 30 seconds walk to a park living the low maintenance lifestyle will be what you will absolutely come to love here at 12 Bevington Cres Officer.
This fresh family home consists of 4 bedrooms all situated on the second floor. Master comes equipped with ensuite and built in robes, bedroom 2 / 3 / 4 are serviced by the main bathroom to the rear of the home and the kids lounge room or second living area is also brilliantly placed up stairs, so everyone has space to relax in.
Heading downstairs we find the heart of the home. Through the front door and conveniently located is the laundry and a third toilet and basin in the powder room. Walking through to the right you have internal access from the double garage and a few steps more and the open Kitchen / Meals / Living welcomes you with open arms. Full of light and space enjoying family time in the heat of the Jetmaster fireplace. Finishing off the kitchen are stone benchtops, stainless steel 900mm oven and cooktop, dishwasher, great storage and a nice big pantry.
Outback you won’t be stressed with cutting the lawns every weekend with synthetic grass but a very earthy and warm seating area to enjoy the warm nights on. On the opposite side of the yard is the rotunda where you can sit back and pour a glass of vino after a long and busy day. All this is located in the stunning Potters Grove in Officer and as mentioned seconds from the family friendly park. Other features of the property include ducted heating and split system air conditioning

Description:
Close to Train Stations, Schools, Princess Freeway and other amenities
Fall in love with this magnificent home in fast growing suburb of southeast Melbourne , with immaculate presentation, spacious interiors and an array of stylish fixtures and fittings throughout, polished floor boards flow through appealing living and dining zones. Located Close proximity to Schools, train station, shopping centre and other amenities, this sophisticated family home is bound to impress anyone who inspects it.
Once you step inside the home you will be immediately impressed with luxurious interior, polished floor boards flow through appealing living and dining zones while carpets to bedrooms. Comprising master with walk-in robe & private ensuite and 3 more spacious bedrooms with generous wardrobe space and central main bathroom, Large open plan family/dining zones completed by well-appointed Kitchen hosting 900mm stainless steel appliance, Caesarstone grand island benchtop, glass splash backs, pantry, adjoining meals area leading to a backyard for entertaining and relaxation
Extras Include:
- Contemporary front and back landscaping
- 900mm Five burner Cooktop
- Dishwasher
- Tile Showerbases
- Ducted heating
- Remote control Double garage
- Evaporative cooling
This home is located short drive from
- Princess Freeway
- Officer train station
- Club officer Cardinia
- Cardinia train station
- Arena shopping centre
- St Clare’s Primary School
- Officer secondary college
- Officer Primary School
- Heritage College
- Berwick Grammer School.
- Minaret College Officer Campus
- Pakenham Lakeside Primary School
- Lakeside College
- St Bridig's Catholic Primary School
- St Francis Xavier College Officer Campus
- Henry Family Children’s Centre
Call Dilshan on 0402 696 602 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

Description:
When Nothing But The Best Will Do
Sitting proudly in arguably the best pocket in the ‘Grandvue Estate’ Officer, this immaculately presented Carlisle built home stands as testament to our vendor’s efforts to build a warm, inviting family home, that anyone would be delighted to call their own.
The moment you walk up the exposed aggregate driveway you know you are in for something very special. The opulent entrance to this four bedroom home will take your breath away as you pass the large master bedroom with walk in robe and an ensuite with the convenience of his and her vanities. The three large remaining bedrooms are serviced by a modern central bathroom offering bath and separate shower and finished with the quality fittings you would expect in a house of this calibre.
There are living areas aplenty. A striking formal lounge with electric digital illuminated glass fireplace, is the perfect place to entertain on those cold winter nights or just to relax with a good book. A second living area and dining area are overlooked by a stunning kitchen complemented by 900mm stainless-steel appliances, stone bench tops and a walk-in pantry spacious enough to cater for the growing family. The home theatre room is the perfect area for the family to watch their favourite movies, or for the kids to enjoy whilst mum and dad relax in the more formal areas.
Added extras to this wonderful residence include, a large undercover decked outdoor area, ideal for entertaining, a low maintenance landscaped rear yard and a large oversized two car garage with internal access to the home.
This meticulously kept home is only moments away from St Clare’s Primary School, St Francis Xavier College, St Clare's Kindergarten and just a short drive to Arena Shopping Centre, Cardinia train station, freeway entrance and opposite beautiful rolling hills complete with its own resident kangaroos.
There are too many inclusions to write about, so please book your private inspection now to avoid the disappointment of missing out on this beautiful family home.
Proudly marketed by Knox's Number 1 Agency
Thinking of selling? Call us today; Boronia office on 9761 2277, Wantirna office on 9800 1225, Rowville office on 9755 6666, Bayswater office on 9720 3030 or Ferntree Gully office on 9752 2889.
TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST click on either of the following tabs and fill in your details, BOOK AN INSPECTION on the Biggin & Scott website or EMAIL AGENT / CONTACT AGENT on Real Estate.com.au and other websites. You will be contacted by one of our agents and will also receive a text advising of inspection times.

Description:
Calling All First Home Buyers And Investors
Perfectly located in the ever popular Cherrington Estate you will find this 2 year old home awaiting you. The home features a well thought out floor plan, with master at the front with built in robes and full ensuite with stone benchtops and double vanity. Remaining two bedrooms are of substantial size, have built in robes and share a central bathroom. To the rear of the home, you will find the light and bright kitchen with stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry that overlooks the open plan meals and living area. The low maintenance backyard is perfect for entertaining. With all the mod cons you could hope for including ducted heating, evaporative cooling, and stone benchtops throughout. With Officer developing and thriving don’t delay in securing this property now.

Description:
SOLD BY Sharon Dyer 0417 114 133!
Why build when all the hard work is completed for you! Add this stunning 5 bedroom, 2 bathroom plus 2 living family home to your list, you won't be disappointed. With its WOW factor street appeal this home grabs your attention as soon as you drive past. The front door is a statement piece and once you step through you will fall in love with the high ceilings and free flowing floor plan. Relax after a hard days work in the formal lounge room while the kids spread out in the spacious family room. The master bedroom is located at the front of the home with his and her walk in robes and an exquisite ensuite. Capture the essence of the open plan living with galley kitchen, stone bench tops, dishwasher, free standing oven and impressive pantry, all this overlooks the formal dining area and family room. The centrally positioned main bathroom services the 4 other bedrooms all of which have built in robes and wall to wall quality carpet. You'll be impressed with the Bi Fold doors that lead out to the magnificent large alfresco area, be impressed with the manicured gardens and the bonus is the spacious rear yard brilliant for kids and or pets to run and play. Additional features include ducted heating, evaporated cooling and double garage. This immaculate home is central to local schools, only minutes to the Monash freeway and all good cafes, wineries and local restaurants.

Description:
A SPECTACULAR ROSE IN ARENA
Located in the Arena Estate is this spectacular home of the finest quality and workmanship with a high attention to detail and design.
Fortunately now it is your opportunity to take advantage of the first class home boasting quality fittings and fixtures. The home offers all the luxuries one could need with 4 Bedrooms, master with full ensuite and his and her walk in robes, polished boards, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, double glazed windows and a beautiful kitchen with Caesar Stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel oven, dishwasher, glass splash backs and huge island bench with breakfast bar suitable for the master chef.
If entertaining is high on your list then this property will excite as there is surround sound throughout the entire house including the lush merbau decked outdoor entertaining area through large bi fold doors. Car accommodation is taken care of with the double remote garage with internal access and sensor lighting. There has been nothing forgotten when finishing this house so there is absolutely nothing left for you to do as the property has extensive landscaping from back to front creating a very private and tranquil setting. Simply move in and enjoy this property. Located within walking distance to The Arena Shopping Centre, St Francis Xavier College, Cardinia Train Station and close access to the M1 Freeway.This property deserves your inspection and has to sell. So call today and make it happen

Description:
GREAT FIRST HOME OR INVESTMENT
Located in the Arcadia Estate this beautiful home's features begin with its modern façade immediately radiating with gorgeous street appeal.
The home accommodates the largest of families with three bedrooms fitted with built in robes serviced by the main bathroom and an additional master bedroom at the rear with walk in robe and full ensuite.
At the heart of the home, sits a generous sized open plan kitchen, meals and living room with stone benches, 600mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, breakfast bar, overhead cabinetry and ample storage. Boasting sliding doors from the living area flowing outwards to the spectacular low maintenance back yard all contribute to a fantastic outdoor retreat. Plenty to offer for the first home buyer, downsizer or investor.
The quality doesn't stop there, offering fantastic features such as 30 years structural warranty, solar hot water system, heating and cooling, roller blinds, single lock up garage with internal and rear access.
Situated in one of Officer's most sought-after estates, this home has it all! Located only minutes from Cardinia train station, shopping centre and some of the finest schools in the area, there is no arguing the location is as good as it gets.

Description:
4 Years Young and Full of Convenience!
Presenting to you an impeccably designed SJD built family home just 4 years young and ready for you to move straight in. Comprising three spacious bedrooms and two separate living zones. The master entailing his & her walk in robe and ensuite, equipped with double vanity and oversized shower, the remaining two bedrooms boast built in robes and an ample amount of floor space which is easily accessible to the shared bathroom and separate toilet.
Located to the front of the home you have a generous sized family room ideal for a second living zone. Moving throughout the home into the kitchen which is sure to impress the chef of the house hold showcasing 900mm oven/stovetop, walk-in pantry and breakfast bar overlooking the spacious open plan dining and living area. Interior extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, laundry, storage through-out including spacious walk-in linen closet, double blinds and double-glazed windows throughout.
Outside you’re welcomed with low maintenance yards, the fantastic sized pergola area will allow you to entertain family and friends in style all year round. Additional outdoor features include double remote garage with internal and external roller door access Situated on a 394sqm block and perfectly located just moments from Arena Parade shopping centre, Lakeside shopping centre, Cardinia train station, bus’s, parkland, restaurants, Café’s and a choice of great schools.
Properties like this appeal to so many buyers so get in quick to secure this home before it is too late.

Build Your Dream Home in Heathfield Estate Officer!!

The block is located right behind Timbertop Estate, in close proximity to shopping centres, established shops, cafes, restaurants, gyms, and footy clubs. Description:
Simply beautiful
Located in the heart of the Arena Estate, fusing a sleek blend of sophisticated living and comfortable light filled entertaining space, This home is immaculately presented and offers high quality living with all the modern day conveniences at your fingertips, featuring;
- 4 great sized bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite
- Spacious living areas with a gas fireplace to the front living room, perfect for the winter nights
- Beautiful alfresco complimented with an enclosed spa area
- Chefs kitchen with stone bench tops, walk in pantry and quality appliances
This home needs to be seen to be appreciated, it's centrally located to quality schools, shops and offers easy access to the freeway and public transport. Don't miss out.

Description:
RED HOT VALUE PRICED TO SELL!!
Young and modern 4 bedroom home oozing space and conveniently located in the popular Arcadia Estate! Packed with features and includes:
* Master with walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity
* Open plan family and meals area, separate rumpus or theatre room
* Striking kitchen with walk in pantry, ample bench space and quality appliances
* Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, large laundry with walk in linen press
* Freshly painted, high ceilings. new carpets
* Double garage with internal access, remote door and rear roller door.
Just a short distance to Bridgewood Primary School, Club Officer, Cardinia Rd Train Station, Freeway Access and Numerous Shopping Facilities, a great area for the young family or a great investment property to add to your portfolio!
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT!
Low Maintenance Living!
Located in the highly sort after Arcadia Estate, surrounded by local schools, shops, public transport and easy reach to the M1 you will find 1 Turquoise Walk Officer up for offer.
Sitting on approx. 313m2 of land this 3-year young and well cared for home is sure to inspect and would suit all buyers – first home buyers, families and investors.
Upon entry of the home you will find the master bedroom which comes complete with walk in robe and full ensuite.
Secondary bedroom with built in robe is featured opposite the master which would be ideal for a young child or even a study.
The kitchen is featured in the heart of the home and comes well equipped with 600mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and ample storage, whilst over looking the large open plan living that steps out to your low maintenance garden, so all you need to do is sit back and enjoy your new home.
The remaining two bedrooms both come with built in robes and easy access to the family bathroom and separate toilet.
Additional features of the home include double lock up garage which is featured at the rear of the property, gas ducted heating, split system cooling, roller blinds throughout and connected to fibre optic for internet and phone.
Rental estimate for this property $370-$380 per week.
1 Turquoise Walk is in the ideal location to have you zoned to some of the best schools in the district. There are options for fantastic primary schools as well as secure zoning into the much sought-after Officer College. There are also some fantastic sporting facilities and organizations at your doorstep. Walking distance to Cardinia Road Station and Shopping Centres.
To find out further information or to arrange a private viewing contact Hayley on 0488 049 143.
Identification is required at all open homes.
*All information contained therein is gathered from relevant third-party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.
Confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
PARKSIDE LIVING – PRICE REDUCED - VENDOR MEETING THE MARKET
Here is a great homesite overlooking a lovely park with playground facilities ready for you to enjoy. Highlighted by mature gum trees this tranquil setting is surrounded by established homes so no need to endure the frantic building and noise associated with the construction of new homes. A level allotment close to the M1 freeway interchange, public transport passes on Brunt Road, with schools & shopping centres close, come and enjoy the fresh country air at this great location. Owner wants it sold.
